However, if the original post contains a global attributional style, it may indicate that the individual has a pervasive depression. In this case, it may be helpful to encourage the individual to seek professional help from a therapist or counselor who can assist them in addressing their negative attributions and developing more adaptive coping strategies.

It's also important to note that transforming attributional style is not always an easy task, and it may require ongoing support and guidance from a mental health professional. Additionally, it's essential to recognize that depression can be a severe mental health condition that requires comprehensive treatment, including medication and therapy.
